dust.filter.message_twohanded: Cannot Be Holding Filters in Both Hands for this Action
dust.tool_link_network: Cannot be Linked to Another Network
dust.pedestal.message_redstone_disable: Redstone Signal Strength Needed to Activate Pedestal:
item.dust.tool_linkingtool.description: §5 Links from the Receiver to the Sender
item.dust.tool_linkingtool.interaction: §3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
item.dust.tool_linkingtoolbackwards.desc: §5 Links from the Sender to the Receiver
item.dust.tool_linkingtoolbackwards.inte: §3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
item.dust.tool_upgradetool.interaction: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_filtertool.interaction: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_tagtool.interaction: §3 Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_devtool.interaction: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Break Pedestals if in Creative Mode
item.dust.filter_base.base_description: THIS FILTER BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.dust.filter_base.description: §5 All other Filters: Crouch Right Click on a Chest to Set the Contents as the Filter, Craft to Clear Filter
item.dust.filter_base.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to Insert the Filter In Pedestal.
item.dust.filter_item.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_itemstack.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_durability.description: §5 This Filter Filters By Item Durability
item.dust.filter_durability.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchanted.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchantedcount.descript: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchants on an Item
item.dust.filter_enchantedcount.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES
item.dust.filter_enchantedexact.descript: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchant Names on Items
item.dust.filter_enchantedexact.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchantedfuzzy.descript: §5 This Filter Filters By Specific Enchants on Items
item.dust.filter_enchantedfuzzy.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_food.description: §5 This Filter Filters out Items the Game Considers Food
item.dust.filter_food.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_mod.description: §5 This Filter Filters By Items From the Same Mod
item.dust.filter_mod.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_restricted.description: §5 This Filter Restricts How Many Items a Pedestal Can Hold
item.dust.filter_restricted.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_tag.description: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an Item (Items in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
item.dust.filter_tag.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.augment_pedestal_nocollide.cra: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground while paper collides with an animal.
item.dust.augment_pedestal_roundrobin.cr: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper and parrots.
item.dust.augment_pedestal_renderdiffuse: §5 Disables Particles and Item/Upgrade Render on Pedestals.
§3 Offhand Item, Crouch Right Click in Air to Toggle
Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper when its raining.
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_base.base_des: §5 THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_base.descript: §5 All Other Upgrades: Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES, Offhand Upgrade and Right Click to Insert Into Pedestal
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_import.descri: §5 Imports from 'Below' Inventory into the Pedestal at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_export.descri: §5 Exports from Pedestal into the Inventory 'Below' at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.dust.item_crystal.description: §5 Obtained from Breaking Clusters of Crystals in Geodes
item.dust.applicator.interaction: §3 Crouch Right Click to Save Color, Right Click to Apply Color, Offhand and Any Placed Crystal Stone Blocks will Place with Current Color.
block.dust.block_inertnode.description: §5 Over time: Generates Clusters Of Crystals, or Converts Stone into Colored Crystal Stone
block.dust.block_inertcluster_full.descr: §5 A Full Sized Cluster of Crystals
block.dust.block_crystal_stone.descripti: §5 Made from Converting Stone with a Crystal Node, used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_crystal_stone_slab.desc: §5 Used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_crystal_stone_stair.des: §5 Used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_pedestal.description: §5 Can Transport Items, Fluids, Energy, and XP, Drop Speed and Slowness Potions on it for Special Effects - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_crystal_cluster.descrip: §5 Made from SandWitching a Crystal Stone Slab between some Stone Slabs, this can hold crystals, and when fueled, give off effects, Any block can be used as its base, and Redstone can be applied to turn it off.
